features: 💦【Compatible with 13" X 4.9" Flat Mop】Our microfiber mop pads are compatible with JOYMOOP, oshang, BOSHENG and various 13.0 × 4.9 inches regular flat mops. Recommend replacing refills every 1-2 months up to use frequency.

💦【Reusable and Washable Pads】Reduce waste and save money with our reusable and washable microfiber mop pads. Simply toss them in the washing machine and they'll be good as new, making cleaning hassle-free and planet-friendly.

💦【High-Quality Microfiber Material Pads】Made from highly absorbent and scratch-free microfiber material, our mop replacement pads ensure a thorough, streak-free clean for all delicate flooring surfaces.

💦【Easy to Attach】Attach the mop pads refill to your flat mop quickly and efficiently. No more disposable pads slipping and sliding – our reusable microfiber pads provide a secure and hassle-free cleaning experience.

💦【Safe on all Floor Types】Our reusable microfiber mop pads are gentle enough for hardwood floors, yet powerful enough to tackle pet hair, debris, and grime on vinyl or ceramic tile. Experience a comprehensive clean for all your floors with one versatile product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Looking for a quick and easy solution to your cleaning problems? Look no further than our flat mop pads replacement! A must-have item for any busy home or office, these mop pads are designed for mop head replacement to keep your floors sparkling clean. Made from high-quality microfiber material, these mop replacement pads are incredibly soft and gentle on your floors, yet tough enough to pick up even the most stubborn dirt and grime. They're also machine washable for your convenience, allowing you to reuse them again and again without worrying about disposable pads piling up in the trash. With their easy-to-attach design, these mop pads are perfect for use with any flat mop head. Simply slide the pad onto the mop head and you're ready to go! Whether you're cleaning hardwood floors, tile, or laminate, these mop replacement pads are the perfect tool for the job. So why wait? Order your flat mop pads replacement today and experience the ultimate in cleaning convenience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reusable Mop Pads Compatible with Joymop Flat Mop. Work well and easy to launder for reuse.
reviews.reviewText: The "Reusable Mop Pads Compatible with Joymop Flat Mop" are a good option for people who are looking for a more sustainable and economical way to clean their floors. They are effective at cleaning both dry and wet messes, and they are made of high-quality microfiber materials.Easy to hand or machine launder, but don't use any fabric softeners to maintain absorbency and air dry for longer pad life.The pads fit well on my Swiffer mop and clean as well as or better than disposable pads.Pros:Reusable and machine washable, saving money and being more environmentally friendly than disposable mop padsCompatible with Swiffer PowerMop and other brands of 14 to 16 inch mopsEffective at cleaning both dry and wet messesMade of high-density microfiber that absorbs and locks in dirt and debrisSoft microfiber cloth won't scratch floorsConvenient hanging loop for easy placement and quick drying.Cons:Microfiber products shed microplastics during use and laundering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These stick ok. Not as good as some, but better than others.Comes with 2 types of pads. One has extra plastic bristles to help with scrubbing.Ok thickness. Not super thin like some.Does an ok job of cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit my mop perfectly
reviews.reviewText: These replacement pads fit my mop perfectly, and stayed on just fine. I have not had any problems with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Absorbent, And Thick; Can be used for other mop brands
reviews.reviewText: While these are replacement pads are for Joymoop, I will be using them for my Swifter and a Dollar Store mop. The pads are bigger than the base of my mops, but they stick to the velcro of the mops. That's all I need. The pads are soft, thick and plush. They are so much better than other pads, I have tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These mop pads fit my mop perfectly and stay attached nicely as I mopped. They are very absorbent, clean well and rinse well too. After mopping, I washed the pad and it came out of the washer and dryer even softer than the first use. I would order these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to attach and detach, absorbent, traps dirt in, machine washable
reviews.reviewText: Those mop pad replacements have neutral color and pattern designs which I like better than colorful ones. Not that it matters much. Just my personal preference. They are super easy to attach to/detach from the mop head, and machine washable. Soft, absorbent, minimum loose threads/shedding. Very good at trapping dirt in.
